text: V Den' voskreseniya ty, o tot, k kotoromu obrashcheny eti slova, uvidish', kak strashatsya nechestivtsy, vredivshiye sebe tem, chto priderzhivalis' mnogobozhiya, kary za ikh mnogobozhiye, a ona nepremenno postignet ikh. I ty uvidish', kak veruyushchiye, kotoryye sovershali dobryye deyaniya, budut zhit' v nailuchshikh mestakh raya. Dlya nikh v rayu ot ikh Gospoda - vso blazhenstvo, kotoroye oni pozhelayut. Takaya bol'shaya nagrada - velikaya milost' (ot Allakha), na kotoruyu vozlagayetsya nadezhda
